content: another pattern from wandering cat studio gnome for the holidays materials small amount of sport weight yarn small amount of paint in your choice of set of 3mm dpns skin tone optional one 10 cm faux fur pompom small amount of stuffing one 15mm wood bead hot glue gun and glue sticks to make hat cast on 30 stitches next round *knit 2 k2tog* repeat from * four more times join in the round being careful not to twist knit five more rounds round 1 purl next round *knit 1 k2tog* repeat from * four round 2 knit more times round 3 purl knit five more rounds knit five more rounds next round k2tog around next round *knit 4 k2tog* repeat from * four knit one round more times next round k2tog k3tog knit five more rounds cut thread and weave through remaining next round *knit 3 k2tog* repeat from * four stitches pulling tight weave in ends more times knit five more rounds to assemble paint wood bead if desired lightly stuff hat so it holds a nice round shape at the bottom hot glue rim of hat to pompom hot glue wood bead nose to pompom at the very edge of hat thread a 3-4-inch piece of yarn thorough top of hat and knot hang your gnome where he s sure to spread holiday delight
